snippet.title: BR1: INFINITE  |  Gameplay Trailer #1
snippet.description:
Dive into the ultimate NFT-based shooter TODAY. Play now!

Play BR1: Infinite Royale, the first kill-to-earn Solana-based game on the blockchain. Fight it out to the death on one giant map where all gamers unite to earn SOL for your in-game performance. Pay $1 to spawn and earn the greater of 10% or $1 for every player killed. 

Begin your epic journey for survival on the edge of the map, and work your way to the core for better loot & higher stakes. Summon your inner ape by connecting your wallet and battling it out on the battlefield.

Do you have what it takes to stay alive? Find out NOW!

#web3 #solana #nft #gaming
